job_description:
• US citizen or green card holder: This position requires access to documentation that is controlled by the export laws of the United States.
• Candidates are required to provide proof of either US citizenship, Permanent US residency, or classification as a protected individual as defined in 8USC 1324b(a)(3).
• Team Collaboration: Contribute to running R&D projects under the supervision of an experienced R&D project manager Education: Actively pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Project Management, Business, or a related field Soft Skills: Strong collaboration and communication skills to work effectively within a team environment Skill Development: Build hands-on experience in project management within a 12-week summer internship Project Skills: Interest in project management with strong organizational and time management skills.

• US citizen or green card holder: This position requires access to documentation that is controlled by the export laws of the United States.
• Candidates are required to provide proof of either US citizenship, Permanent US residency, or classification as a protected individual as defined in 8USC 1324b(a)(3).
• Education: Actively pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Materials Science, Chemical Engineering, or a related field Materials Knowledge: Basic understanding of material properties and selection, especially those used in high-reliability (HiRel) environments Technical Expertise: Familiarity with CAD software (e.
• , SolidWorks, AutoCAD, or similar) and 3D modeling tools Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written communication skills to convey technical insights effectively Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to analyze problems, troubleshoot, and contribute to process improvements Safety Compliance: Ensure all safety requirements and protocols are followed during project execution.
